content.rendered:
Johnson Consulting Group and its staff have transformed how we operate the “back end” of the house. We have been able to reduce accounting costs and they save me the time of gathering all my data myself. The reports they provide are truly meaningful and I can’t imagine doing business without them now.  I would not hesitate to recommend Johnson Consulting group to anybody who needs accounting or management services.

Warren Claybar

Claybar Funeral Homes

Beaumont, TX
